channel.title: syscall on Fossix
channel.description: Recent content in syscall on Fossix

item.title: The exec() system call
item.description: This is part of the series ‘The Life of a process’. This write-up is about the exec system call. We saw about how a process is created, but how is a new program gets loaded? Let’s see here.

item.title: The fork() system call
item.description: This is part of the series titles The Life of a Process. This part tell about how a fork system call works which is required to create a new process.
